column4: i wonder if anyone can help... I have allocated too much space to partition dev/hda5 and swap, and wish to resize to increase the size of my home partition... can this be done easily?
ok, yes this can be done easily if you know what you're doing - boot single mode - remove the swap partition (swapoff) & unmount home - run gparted to resize partitions & reboot
gl - just be careful you get it right & don't touch any other file systems
